1.zh_CN: 看图刷卡有奇效：给Anki内置多浏览器与截图

tip.zh_CN: A widget aside Anki reviewer which queries the frist field of current note and display as web, and capture the web as image and save it in your note!
tip.en: A widget aside Anki reviewer which queries the frist field of current note and display as web, and capture the web as image and save it in your note!

1.zh_CN: 用Anki学英语影视例句，英语学习必备插件

tip.zh_CN: 人人词典场景例句, 这个插件根据当前卡片的单词提供图片和音频抓取和播放
tip.en: Query English word and show image, sounds, and sentences in videos and series

tip.zh_CN: 使用番茄工作（学习）法，选择一个牌组，将番茄时间设为10-25分钟，极简模式专注刷卡！
tip.en: Query English word and show image, sounds, and sentences in videos and series
